name: My Perfect Selfie
description:
My Perfect Selfie be a Social Influencer game will let you make a perfect selfie with your dreams. Every girl wants to look beautiful and like to post her crazy selfies on social media. These girls friends are getting ready for some crazy selfies contest held in town. My perfect selfie is a free fun story game for girls. She dreams of becoming famous on social media and be the influencer for young girls. Now you have chance become the social media influencer fashion star.

Taking the good selfies with a top trending fashion outfits and makeup will help this crazy selfie master to become famous on social media. You will love to compete with your friends and other people in the selfie contest. Get ready for an amazing photography session. Let’s arrange your pictures album and choose only your favourite pics.

Tips to take a perfect selfie ?

-> Striking a pose & Capture a good angle
-> Showoff something new
-> Smile or do something cheerful
-> focus on some good features & interesting expressions
-> Take full length photo & Try a natural look
-> Use your phone back camera & give your lips expressions
-> Do not use mirror until you do not have other option
-> Watch put for photos bombers
-> Experiments with selfie filters
-> Edit the photo & upload to all feeds
-> Get in on trends & make sure setting is appropriate
-> Amp up your erotic features & set the scene
-> Get comfortable & pose
-> Cartoon , decoration , depiction , engraving & etching is imp for perfect selfies

Game Features:

- High quality game for Kids, girls and high school teens
- Easy to touch and control with qualities graphics
- Fun for girls of school and teens
- Different gorgeous dresses to choose for girls and teens
- Dozens of dress accessories for High school girls
- Lot of beautiful clothes colors & hairstyling salon
- Fun accessories to complete the makeover are ready for endless combinations
- Share your creations easily by Save in your images gallery

Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring and dressUp games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
